Comment to English: If the Dhaka Metro Rail has to make profitable, the amount of passengers should be increased. How to increase the amount of passenger? Why would passengers choose the metro-rall for public transport? The people of Dhaka need to be given enough reasons so that they choose the Metro-Rail as a Primary Transport. What are those reasons? All the amenities that are so associated with human life need to be closest to the metro-Rail. Such as GAS office etc. If you target some of the special stations of Metro Station, the stations are allocated to the 4/4 storey building up to three (3) floor for Metro Rail, if the remaining 1/5 floor rents by renting a commercial office or shopping center. Money was profitable from all these businesses. And the people would benefit in huge amounts because of their necessary services inside the metro. For all these services, people used to give priority to the metro. This huge metro rail depot made with 5 acres {one acre = 3 bigha} outside Uttara. The government of Bangladesh did not once wondered what the benefits of making this huge 5 acre land of the Metro Rail? At the same time, what else can we make in this 5 acre place? Building can be made at 5pm at 5 acres or 5 bighas of land. Bangladesh is running out of space
